page.title: 15A Week At School.
page.content: The school I go to is{Utterby C.P.}Our school starts at 9.20 am. On{Monday} morning the second and third years go into the hall to watch TV with our teacher, Mr. Gardner. We watch{MUSIC {TIME}and{ZIG ZAG.}In the afternoon we usually do maths. After maths Mrs. Cowlrick reads a story. On{Tuesday} morning we do nature and a choice of english or maths. In the afternoon we do art. On{Wednesday}we do story. After story we go swimming. In the afternoon we do practical maths. On { {Thursday}morning the second and third years do drama and science. In the afternoon we do crafts and painting. On{Friday}morning we do geography and english. In the afternoon we do games. By Suzanne Burns, aged 10.
